name: Digital Edge
tag_list: digital, media, consulting, strategy, business-strategy, product, marketing, digital-marketing, product-management, mba, product-development, analysis, product-design, web-design, online-marketing, online-products, internet-strategy, digital-strategy, dig
overview:
Digital Edge provides targeted, forward-thinking strategy, product and marketing solutions to business leaders looking to profit from the dynamic field of digital media. DE specializes in digital media content, products, marketing, strategy and consumers - including digital product design and management, new media strategy, audience engagement, interactivity, user experience and social media.

They deliver…

* Innovative, realistic solutions
* Objective recommendations and exceptional thought partnership
* Answers customized to the unique goals and capabilities of each client
* Passionate dedication to helping our clients overcome their most significant hurdles

Leveraging: * Data-based analysis and research-based insights * Experience-based intuition and common sense * Digital expertise acquired from working with top-tier Internet and Media & Entertainment companies * General management training from a diverse professional background * Unerring professionalism and integrity * Communication skills born of working with and problem solving for Senior Management at leading companies
